capstone.name: Bloodlust
data: [Battle Fuel]: When you drop a creature to 0 HP, gain 2 HP and 1 CP.
[Field Practice]: All melee attacks deal double damage.

capstone.name: Paladin
data: [Rending Smite - 2 CP]: On a successful melee attack, the creature will take an additional 1d6 of the same damage.
[Vengeful Guardian]: When an ally within 60 ft of you is knocked into critical condition, immediately take a turn restoring all your SP.

capstone.name: Generator
data: [Paradoxal Packing]: You no longer need to pay for upkeep.
[Temporal Rationing]: When you use a grenade, ration, or consumable roll 1d6. On a 5+ the item is not consumed when used.

capstone.name: Slayer
data: [Slayerâ€™s Mark]: Every short rest you may mark a creature. When this creature is defeated, regain TP equal to half your max HP, and mark a new creature.

capstone.name: Brutalist
data: [Corpse Beater - 1 CP]: Grab a creature that has perished or is in critical condition, and deal 2 Major bludgeoning damage to a target within 10 ft of you. The corpse is destroyed after use.
[Brutalizer]: When a creature drops to 0 HP, they are brutalized and all creatures in a 15 ft radius must make a Smarts check of 4+ or gain the Scared Condition for 1 turn.

capstone.name: Surefire
data: [Steady Hands]: At the cost of 2 Faults, your next ranged attack will deal double damage.
[Trained Eye]: Once per short rest, deal triple damage on a successful ranged attack.

capstone.name: Blitz
data: [Quick Draw]: Your first ranged attack in combat will deal triple damage, gain 2 Prowess, and ignore resistances.
[Rapid Fire]: Reduce the cost of a ranged attack by 1 SP, but take 2 Faults. This ability may not be used on attacks that only cost 1 SP.
